title: I’m a Dress-Obsessed Fashion Editor—26 of the Chicest I’m Buying From J.Crew’s Major One-Day Sale
excerpt: From white linen dresses to floral maxi dresses, we're sharing the best dresses from J.Crew's major one-day sale.
text: If there's one thing about me, it's that I love a great dress. It's one of the best things about dressing for the spring and summer months—the one and done piece requires minimal effort with maximum impact and if you find the right fit and style it will keep you comfortable and put together from day to night. There are a few brands and retailers I turn to when shopping for spring/summer dresses and one of them is J.Crew. Lucky for me (and you!) J.Crew is having a major dress sale with 40% off select styles from April 27-28. You'll find everything from breezy linen styles—perfect for warm weather days, to elevated silky slip dresses that will take you from day-to-night in style along with fashion-forward A-line styles and butter yellow hues, as well as crisp shirt dresses for work and beyond.I've done the hard work for you and rounded up 27 of my favorite dresses that are all deeply discounted today. Keep scrolling and don't miss out on these major deals. jcrew Natasha Slip Dress in Polka-Dot Print Polka-dots are trending and this chic slip is perfect for day to night. jcrew Flared Mini Dress in this look into the night. jcrew Off-The-Shoulder Slip Dress in Budding Rose Print jcrew Collection Ruched Maxi Dress in Luster Georgette Love the elegant ruching and gorgeous deep brown color. jcrew shirt dress I'll be living in for summer in the city. jcrew Delilah Dress in Cotton Poplin jcrew Hyacinth Dress in Polka-Dot Linen Ideal for warm-weather daytime events. jcrew Collection Sequin Slip Fitted-Waist Shirtdress in Cotton Poplin The cinched in silhouette is so flattering. jcrew Bubble-Hem Mixy Dress Bubble hems are trending. jcrew Collection Layered Slip Sweater-Dress A layered slip for a soft, sleek, and romantic look. jcrew Drop-Waist Mixy Dress I also really like this in black. jcrew Hyacinth V-Neck Dress in Ramie You'll appreciate all the thoughtful details such as an ultra-flattering smocked bodice, a V-neckline, and pockets. jcrew Collection Smocked Chiffon Dress A dress made for dancing. jcrew Gathered-Waist Mixy Dress An effortlessly stylish combination of html:
If there's one thing about me, it's that I love a great dress. It's one of the best things about dressing for the spring and summer months—the one and done piece requires minimal effort with maximum impact and if you find the right fit and style it will keep you comfortable and put together from day to night. There are a few brands and retailers I turn to when shopping for spring/summer dresses and one of them is J.Crew. Lucky for me (and you!) J.Crew is having a major dress sale with 40% off select styles from April 27-28. You'll find everything from breezy linen styles—perfect for warm weather days, to elevated silky slip dresses that will take you from day-to-night in style along with fashion-forward A-line styles and butter yellow hues, as well as crisp shirt dresses for work and beyond.

I've done the hard work for you and rounded up 27 of my favorite dresses that are all deeply discounted today. Keep scrolling and don't miss out on these major deals.

jcrew

Polka-dots are trending and this chic slip is perfect for day to night.
